name: Robin Roschlau
bio: I've been slightly addicted to Kotlin ever since I first used it, coming from Java a few years ago, so much so that I started a Kotlin User Group in my area and am regularly holding talks about it.

name: Rajesh Khadka
bio: I love to share the knowledge. Kotlin similarities with other modern programming language brought me into it. Currently working on building mathematical foundations for data science.
